metadata.title: Report the use of environmental protection equipment

email.responseTime: We aim to respond as soon as possible.

metadata.submissionGuidance:
Thank you for reporting the environmental equipment used at an incident. 

If you've requested a copy of the report, we'll send it to the email address you provided within 10 working days.

draft.name: Report the use of environmental protection equipment

pages.title: What fire and rescue service attended the incident?

components.name: PysKZe
components.title: Fire and rescue service name
components.hint: If a fire and rescue service is not listed, enter 'other'.

pages.title: Summary
What's the name of the fire station that attended the incident?
Who was the incident commander?
What's the phone number for the incident commander?
What's the email address for the incident commander?
Was the Environment Agency contacted during the incident?

components.name: vOQxqz
components.title: Environment Agency contacted during the incident

pages.title: Did an Environment Agency officer attend the incident?
What's the name of the Environment Agency officer who attended the incident?

components.name: nzZeRT
components.title: Name of the Environment Agency officer who attended the incident
components.hint: Enter 'Do not know' if you do not know the name of the Environment Agency officer who attended the incident.

pages.title: Has the incident commander told the Environment Agency about this incident?

components.name: sHBhhw
components.title: Has Incident commander told the Environment Agency about this incident?

pages.title: Do you know the fire and rescue service incident number?

components.name: mcTmYC
components.title: Fire and rescue service incident number known
components.hint: This is the number your fire service assigns to each incident.

pages.title: What's the date of the incident?
What's the fire and rescue service incident number?
Do you know the address for where the incident occurred?

components.name: LRuDag
components.title: Address where incident occurred is known
components.hint: If you do not know the address, you can provide a grid reference number or what3words instead.

pages.title: What's the address where the incident occurred?

components.name: XfAyhp
components.title: Address where the incident occurred
components.hint: Include the postcode if you know it.

pages.title: Incident location

components.name: nshGYk
components.title: Html
components.content:
If you do not have an address for the location, we need to know where the incident took place.

You can use what3words (opens in new tab) or Defra Magic Maps (opens in new tab) to get a grid reference number.

pages.title: Provide a brief description of the incident
Pollution details

components.name: FAENej
components.title: How much of this pollution type was spilled?
components.hint: Add the amount and the measurement if you know it, for example, 5 litres. If you do not know it, enter 'not known'

pages.title: Are there any extenuating circumstances about this incident?

components.name: NNjFLF
components.title: Extenuating circumstances
components.hint: The Environment Agency will attempt to claim the cost of providing the equipment from the polluter. If there's an extenuating circumstance, the Environment Agency is less likely to recover the cost. For example, if an owner of a parked car was not aware their vehicle was leaking oil into a storm drain, causing pollution to enter a river.

pages.title: What are the extenuating circumstances for this incident?
Is the incident commander the main contact to discuss the environmental protection equipment used during the incident?

components.name: yPAyQU
components.title: Incident commander can provide details of equipment used
components.hint: The Environment Agency may need to discuss the equipment used during an incident. You can nominate a contact to have these discussions.

pages.title: Who can we contact about the incident?

components.name: dCHXoG
components.title: Name of contact for the incident
components.hint: The Environment Agency  will contact this person if they need more information about the equipment used at an incident.

pages.title: What's the email address for the main contact?

components.name: fjcaMK
components.title: Email address of contact for the incident

pages.title: What caused the incident?
Do you have any contact details for the polluter?

components.name: PKjapp
components.title: Can provide contact details
components.hint: To reclaim the cost of providing equipment to fire and rescue services, the Environment Agency needs the contact details of the polluter.

pages.title: Contact details

components.name: SXmLAc
components.title: Html
components.content:
Please provide the contact details of the polluter. The Environment Agency will use these contact details to pursue the polluter for payment of the equipment used during the incident.

All fields are optional.

components.name: zpAkIG
components.title: Name of the polluter
components.hint: This can be an individual's name or a company name

pages.title: Equipment used at the incident

components.name: kGKmVS
components.title: Html
components.content: View images and descriptions of the items in our equipment catalogue (opens in new tab).

components.name: BRazkH
components.title: How many of this item were used?

pages.title: What other fire and rescue service attended the incident?

components.name: KltifE
components.title: The other fire and rescue service's name

pages.title: What was responsible for the incident?

components.name: UazPTI
components.title: Name of person or company that caused the pollution

pages.title: What's the phone number for the main contact?

components.name: niNIaj
components.title: Phone number for contact for the incident

pages.title: Do you know the registration number of the vehicle that caused the incident?
What's the registration number of the vehicle that caused the incident?
Do you know who owns the vehicle?
Do you know who was the incident commander?
Do you have contact details for the incident commander?
Do you want a copy of this report for your records?
Do you have any information that could enable the Environment Agency to identify the polluter?

components.name: fAPGNI
components.title: Information available to determine the polluter

pages.title: Provide any information you have that could help the Environment agency determine the polluter

components.name: fyaJVy
components.title: Information that could help the Environment Agency determine the polluter

pages.title: What's the email address for receiving a copy of this report?

components.name: iGfART
components.title: Email address for copy of report
